html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08832024-07-18ECCC
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS (MDMER) in order to (1) add two waterbodies and two geographical areas encompassing eight water bodies, to Schedule 2 of the MDMER designating them as tailings impoundment areas (TIAs); and (2) authorize their destruction for the purpose of the disposal of mine waste which representing a loss of 3.66 hectares (ha) of fish habitat as tailings impoundment areas.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0162 Publication Date: 2024-07-31
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS (MDMER) in order to (1) add two waterbodies and two geographical areas encompassing eight water bodies, to Schedule 2 of the MDMER designating them as tailings impoundment areas (TIAs); and (2) authorize their destruction for the purpose of the disposal of mine waste which representing a loss of 3.66 hectares (ha) of fish habitat as tailings impoundment areas.
